title: 最新的hmcl运行RL整合包错误怎么办
author: 空余沧桑
txt_content:
Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 3.3.170
  Time: 2020-05-16 22:55:13
  Thread: Thread[JavaFX Application Thread,5,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread
        at java.lang.Thread.start0(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Thread.start(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.CrashReporter.reportToServer(CrashReporter.java:154)
        at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.CrashReporter.lambda$uncaughtException$0(CrashReporter.java:130)
        at com.sun.javafx.application.PlatformImpl.lambda$null$5(PlatformImpl.java:295)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at com.sun.javafx.application.PlatformImpl.lambda$runLater$6(PlatformImpl.java:294)
        at com.sun.glass.ui.InvokeLaterDispatcher$Future.run(InvokeLaterDispatcher.java:95)
        at com.sun.glass.ui.win.WinApplication._runLoop(Native Method)
        at com.sun.glass.ui.win.WinApplication.lambda$null$4(WinApplication.java:186)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 10 10.0
  Java Version: 1.8.0_251, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
  JVM Max Memory: 259522560
  JVM Total Memory: 76492800
  JVM Free Memory: 8964376

replies.author: lengshao233
replies.txt_content: 内存溢出了吧，在启动器里分配多点

replies.author: 空余沧桑
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-16 22:57
尝试分配更多的内存
可启动器建议不能超过32位java的要求，要1028及以下

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
空余沧桑 发表于 2020-5-16 23:22
可启动器建议不能超过32位java的要求，要1028及以下
卸载之前安装的所有 java ，安装这个 https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

然后在启动器中分配更多的内存

replies.author: 空余沧桑
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-16 23:24
卸载之前安装的所有 java ，安装这个 https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

然后在启动器中分配 ...
全部加载成功，显示等待游戏进入，等了1个多小时没反应。。。。。
